mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_location_sku_volume SET serial_number = #{serialNumber,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , location_id = #{locationId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , sku_id = #{skuId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , lower_capacity = #{lowerCapacity,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , upper_capacity = #{upperCapacity,javaType=java.lang.Integer,jdbcType=INTEGER} , create_time = #{createTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , created_id = #{createdId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , modified_id = #{modifiedId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id} and ou_id = #{ouId} and last_modify_time <= #{lastModifyTime}
mapper.select: select ls.id as id, ls.serial_number as serialNumber, ls.location_id as locationId, ls.sku_id as skuId, ls.lower_capacity as lowerCapacity, ls.upper_capacity as upperCapacity, ls.ou_id as ouId, ls.create_time as createTime, ls.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, ls.created_id as createdId, ls.modified_id as modifiedId, sku.code as skuCode, loc.code as locationCode, sku.name as skuName, sum(skuInv.on_hand_qty) as onHandQty from t_wh_location_sku_volume as ls left join t_wh_facility_location_sku_volume as fs on fs.lsv_id = ls.id left join t_wh_sku_inventory as skuInv on ls.sku_id = skuInv.sku_id and ls.location_id = skuInv.location_id left join t_wh_location as loc on loc.id = ls.location_id left join t_wh_sku as sku on ls.sku_id = sku.id where fs.facility_id = #{facilityId} and fs.ou_id = #{ouId} group by skuInv.location_id,skuInv.sku_id
